eu.wauz.wauzcore.mobs

Class MenacingMobsConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.mobs.MenacingMobsConfig

  • public class MenacingMobsConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the place, where metadata is generated from the MythicMobs config, so that the spawner can insert it into the mob. This includes menacing modifiers, boss bars, aswell as exp and key drops.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    MenacingMobsSpawner

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private boolean enableRaidHealthBar
      If the mob will receive a boss health bar (in purple).
      private boolean enableSecondModifier

      Reads the values from the MythicConfig into the new MenacingMobsConfig Possible config values are: BestiaryEntry (name) = The full name of the mob's bestiary entry.

    • Field Detail

      • bestiaryEntryName

        private java.lang.String bestiaryEntryName
        The full name of the mob's bestiary entry.

      • enableModifiers

        private boolean enableModifiers
        If the mob will receive a menacing modifier. One in 20 chance, if enabled.

      • enableSecondModifier

        private boolean enableSecondModifier
        If the mob will receive a second menacing modifier. One in 4 chance, if it already has a first one.

      • enableHealthBar

        private boolean enableHealthBar
        If the mob will receive a health bar (in red, or yellow if menacing).

      • enableRaidHealthBar

        private boolean enableRaidHealthBar
        If the mob will receive a boss health bar (in purple).

      • expDropString

        private java.lang.String expDropString
        How much exp the mob will drop and for which level.

      • keyDropString

        private java.lang.String keyDropString
        What key the mob will drop.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MenacingMobsConfig

        public MenacingMobsConfig(io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.io.MythicConfig mythicConfig)
        Reads the values from the MythicConfig into the new MenacingMobsConfig Possible config values are: BestiaryEntry (name) = The full name of the mob's bestiary entry. MenacingChance = The mob can have menacing modifiers. CustomBossBar --Raid = Has a boss bar, raid attribute colors it purple. GrantExp (level) (percent) = It will drop exp up to a specific level. GrantKey (name) = It will drop the named key.
        Parameters:
        mythicConfig - The mythic mobs config.
